byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow.

abstract: Turkey moves to ease tensions with Russia in connection with downing of Russian warplane by Turkish military, with Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan calling for face-to-face meeting with Pres Vladimir V Putin.
lead_paragraph: Ankara said airstrikes against the Islamic State in Syria had been suspended as it sought a solution, possibly at the Paris climate talks next week.

headline.main: Turkey Seeks to Ease Tensions Over Shooting Down of Russian Jet
headline.print_headline: Turkey Tries to Lower Tensions With Kremlin After Shooting Down Russian Jet

snippet: Ankara said airstrikes against the Islamic State in Syria had been suspended as it sought a solution, possibly at the Paris climate talks next week.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
